summary: Two lovers engage in a passionate but thwarted romance in this modern adaptation of the classic novel.
cast: Erika Christensen|Mike Vogel|Christopher Masterson|Johnny Whitworth|Katherine Heigl|John Doe|Aimee Osbourne|Rye|Adam Taylor Gordon|Seth Adkins|Cordelia González|Edward Marshall|Pili Montilla|Michelle Deliz
title: Wuthering Heights
